expo.name: FoodLocker Business
expo.description: FoodLocker's Restaurant Mobile Application.  Allows employees of restaurants/dining halls to access FoodLockers.  Employees will keep the FoodLocker stocked and information will automatically be uploaded to a database.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allows users to upload pictures of meals taken with their phone, rather than using generic pictures.  Same with profile picture, if desired.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app does not require access to the microphone.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allows users to take a picture of a meal to upload to the database.  Same with profile picture, if desired.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Allows the user to login to the application using biometrics
